title: Feature: Blank out app preview screen when switching apps on mobile
body:
# Feature Request

As a user, I'd like the app preview screen to be blanked out when switching apps.  This would increase my privacy.

As a bonus, I would like this to be a user option, but on by default.

Issue Status: 1. **Open** 2. Started 3. Submitted 4. Done

thanks @StatusSceptre for considering me!

Hey @bitsikka, just a heads up.  I'm training someone else to help out with handling the bounties so we're more snappy about it.  This will be on the list of things to go through on Monday.  Thank you so much for your patience with us!

@corpetty 

> I'm training someone else to help out with handling the bounties so we're more snappy about it.

awesome!

> Thank you so much for your patience with us!

most welcome! 👍
@flexsurfer @mandrigin - Is this PR considered complete? Can I release the bounty funds?
@StatusSceptre not yet, still on review

Doesn't work after merge https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8009 in `develop`
@bitsikka can you please take a look?

> Doesn't work after merge #8009 in `develop`
> @bitsikka can you please take a look?

@churik can you please elaborate? I just tested in iOS simulator and it works for me.

could it be the case that now(this behavior changed at the last moment) the blanking out is **off** by default, and user has to explicitly turn it on in the profile screen?

Yes, you are right. Somehow I decided that it should be enabled by default.
Sorry!

no worries :)

It'd still be nice to have it **on** by default (the problem was, on android, that caused tests that depended on capturing screen to fail)

I'm going to work on making it so that we can have best of both cases after I'm done delivering on other bounties and issues I have committed to.
